item.title: Battle-X - 317 / 634 Gameframe / Updated Combat / Minigames + More
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“The Djinn, post:7, topic:445978”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=548837.msg4023378#msg4023378 date=1340163382]
So what content in here other than the warriors guild is yours?
[/quote]

If you are not able to read the above of which I stated, then I will not waste my time.

i have this feeling your castle wars dont work and that just might be pic of broken version inside waiting area

Nothing is broken.

The server is relatively new, so I’m working on new things\content as I go on with it. My last server I was a developer on was RushPk. Which was hosted for about a year, or a bit longer. So, expect this one to be online for a long time. Expect some a lot more updates to come.[/quote]

Oh, I can read it, but all you told me was you fucked with the client and added a warriors guild.

Read full topic

TimeRS3:

i have this feeling your castle wars dont work and that just might be pic of broken version inside waiting area

The server is relatively new, so I’m working on new things\content as I go on with it. My last server I was a developer on was RushPk. Which was hosted for about a year, or a bit longer. So, expect this one to be online for a long time. Expect some a lot more updates to come.

item.title: Battle-X - 317 / 634 Gameframe / Updated Combat / Minigames + More
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:445978”]Looks decent at best.

All the content I can see has been released in some way or another.[/quote]

Content? I’m using Rune-Legacy as a base. So it has quite a bit of content already. All I have done recently was, update the godwars maps, client gameframe, player vs player combat, added in a little bit of other fixes, and a new warriors guild(had to rip the images from runescape). Don’t think anyone has ever released my warriors guild? Although it took me about 30 minutes to do it lol. Also, compare my combat to the current rune-legacy, PVM and PVP actually. I’m still working on a lot of the new things, I just been working a lot recently(A job) so I can’t get much done as fast.

Read full topic
